Posts.Content: Joyce12791 wrote: can someone please tell me what a "reactive Lymph Node " is ? I have had 2 abnormal mammograms, one abnormal ultrasound, and the next ultrasound next month. I was told this time , during the mammogram, that the lumps are getting bigger. I also have extreme pain, if my yorkie ( he weighs 5 lbs) steps on either breast. i have stopped all caffeine, hoping that would help. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: reactive lymph nodes Joyce12791 inks
